ud5.3:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati veluvane kalandakanivape.
ud5.3:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena rajagahe suppabuddho nama kutthi ahosi—
ud5.3:1.5: Tena kho pana samayena bhagava mahatiya parisaya parivuto dhammam desento nisinno hoti.
ud5.3:2.1: Addasa kho suppabuddho kutthi tam mahajanakayam duratova sannipatitam.
ud5.3:2.3: “nissamsayam kho ettha kinci khadaniyam va bhojaniyam va bhajiyati.
ud5.3:2.5: Appeva namettha kinci khadaniyam va bhojaniyam va labheyyan”ti.
ud5.3:3.1: Atha kho suppabuddho kutthi yena so mahajanakayo tenupasankami.
ud5.3:3.2: Addasa kho suppabuddho kutthi bhagavantam mahatiya parisaya parivutam dhammam desentam nisinnam.
ud5.3:3.4: “na kho ettha kinci khadaniyam va bhojaniyam va bhajiyati.
ud5.3:3.5: Samano ayam gotamo parisati dhammam deseti.
ud5.3:4.1: Atha kho bhagava sabbavantam parisam cetasa ceto paricca manasakasi
ud5.3:4.2: “ko nu kho idha bhabbo dhammam vinnatun”ti?
ud5.3:4.3: Addasa kho bhagava suppabuddham kutthim tassam parisayam nisinnam.
ud5.3:4.6: Suppabuddham kutthim arabbha anupubbim katham kathesi, seyyathidam—
ud5.3:4.7: danakatham silakatham saggakatham; kamanam adinavam okaram sankilesam; nekkhamme anisamsam pakasesi.
ud5.3:4.8: Yada bhagava annasi suppabuddham kutthim kallacittam muducittam vinivaranacittam udaggacittam pasannacittam, atha ya buddhanam samukkamsika dhammadesana tam pakasesi—
ud5.3:4.10: Seyyathapi nama suddham vattham apagatakalakam sammadeva rajanam patigganheyya;
ud5.3:4.11: evamevam suppabuddhassa kutthissa tasmimyeva asane virajam vitamalam dhammacakkhum udapadi:
ud5.3:5.1: Atha kho suppabuddho kutthi ditthadhammo pattadhammo viditadhammo pariyogalhadhammo tinnavicikiccho vigatakathankatho vesarajjappatto aparappaccayo satthu sasane utthayasana yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho suppabuddho kutthi bhagavantam etadavoca:
ud5.3:6.2: Seyyathapi, bhante, nikkujjitam va ukkujjeyya, paticchannam va vivareyya, mulhassa va maggam acikkheyya, andhakare va telapajjotam dhareyya: ‘cakkhumanto rupani dakkhanti’ti; evamevam bhagavata anekapariyayena dhammo pakasito.
ud5.3:6.3: Esaham, bhante, bhagavantam saranam gacchami dhammanca bhikkhusanghanca.
ud5.3:6.4: Upasakam mam bhagava dharetu ajjatagge panupetam saranam gatan”ti.
ud5.3:7.1: Atha kho suppabuddho kutthi bhagavata dhammiya kathaya sandassito samadapito samuttejito sampahamsito bhagavata bhasitam abhinanditva anumoditva utthayasana bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva pakkami.
ud5.3:7.2: Atha kho acirapakkantam suppabuddham kutthim gavi tarunavaccha adhipatitva jivita voropesi.
ud5.3:8.1: Atha kho sambahula bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu.
ud5.3:8.2: Ekamantam nisinna kho te bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavocum:
ud5.3:8.3: “yo so, bhante, suppabuddho nama kutthi bhagavata dhammiya kathaya sandassito samadapito samuttejito sampahamsito, so kalankato.
ud5.3:9.1: “Pandito, bhikkhave, suppabuddho kutthi; paccapadi dhammassanudhammam; na ca mam dhammadhikaranam vihesesi.
ud5.3:9.2: Suppabuddho, bhikkhave, kutthi tinnam samyojananam parikkhaya sotapanno avinipatadhammo niyato sambodhiparayano”ti.
ud5.3:10.1: Evam vutte, annataro bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
ud5.3:10.2: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo yena suppabuddho kutthi ahosi—
ud5.3:11.1: “Bhutapubbam, bhikkhave, suppabuddho kutthi imasmimyeva rajagahe setthiputto ahosi.
ud5.3:11.2: So uyyanabhumim niyyanto addasa tagarasikhim paccekabuddham nagaram pindaya pavisantam.
ud5.3:11.6: So tassa kammassa vipakena bahuni vassasatani bahuni vassasahassani bahuni vassasatasahassani niraye paccittha.
ud5.3:11.7: Tasseva kammassa vipakavasesena imasmimyeva rajagahe kutthi ahosi manussadaliddo, manussakapano, manussavarako.
ud5.3:11.8: So tathagatappaveditam dhammavinayam agamma saddham samadiyi silam samadiyi sutam samadiyi cagam samadiyi pannam samadiyi.
ud5.3:11.9: So tathagatappaveditam dhammavinayam agamma saddham samadiyitva silam samadiyitva sutam samadiyitva cagam samadiyitva pannam samadiyitva kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapanno devanam tavatimsanam sahabyatam.
ud5.3:11.10: So tattha anne deve atirocati vannena ceva yasasa ca”ti.
ud5.3:12.1: Atha kho bhagava etamattham viditva tayam velayam imam udanam udanesi:
